text: Robert Brian Wilson (born March 8, 1962) is an American actor, singer, and voice artist. He is best known for portraying Billy Chapman in Silent Night, Deadly Night (1984). ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American stand-up comedians Category:Singers from California Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from California Category:Comedians from California
title: Robert Brian Wilson
